whySa.title: Why people choose South Africa
whySa.subtitle: South Africa offers a unique mix of lifestyle, education, business opportunities and warm climate that attracts families, professionals and investors.
whySa.highlightTitle: A new chapter with more space and possibility
whySa.highlightBody: Quality education, lower tuition and living costs compared to many Western countries, and vibrant cities like Cape Town and Johannesburg make South Africa an attractive long-term choice.

lifestyle.title: Lifestyle & climate
lifestyle.body: Mild climate, ocean and mountain views, fresh food, and family-friendly neighbourhoods with space, gardens and outdoor living.

education.title: Recognised education
education.body: South African schools and universities are recognised internationally, with more affordable fees than many EU, US or UK institutions.

opportunity.title: Business & investment
opportunity.body: A gateway to the African continent, member of BRICS, and an environment where entrepreneurs and investors can find new opportunities.

costOfLiving.title: Cost of living
costOfLiving.body: In many cases, everyday expenses, services and housing can be more affordable than in Europe or North America, while maintaining a comfortable lifestyle.

aboutBrief.title: Who we are
aboutBrief.subtitle: We are a South African-based immigration and education consultancy helping Russian-speaking and international clients move, study and build a new life in South Africa.
aboutBrief.body: Our team has lived in South Africa for many years and understands both the local system and the questions you have before you decide to move. We work with trusted immigration professionals and educational partners to give you clear guidance, realistic timelines and support at each stage of your journey.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Here are some of the questions we hear most often from clients who are just starting to look at South Africa or international visas.

0.question: Where do I start if I want to move to South Africa?
0.answer: Usually we start with a short consultation and basic eligibility check. We look at your goals, profession, family situation and timelines, and then suggest realistic visa options.

1.question: Do I have to speak English perfectly to apply?
1.answer: Fluent English is not always required for every visa type, but it will help with work and daily life. During consultation we can explain which programmes have language requirements.

2.question: Can you help if I already live in South Africa?
2.answer: Yes. We support clients who are already in South Africa and need to extend, change or correct their visa status, as well as those who are only planning to move.
